title: Chronicle wrap-up controls
description: Add UI toggle to request wrapping, update narrative weaver prompt to honor targetEndTurn, and set chronicle targetEndTurn when wrapping is enabled.

title: Chronicle closure summary processor
description: When the narrative engine closes a chronicle (GMSummaryNode.shouldCloseChronicle == true), emit a message onto a dedicated internal SQS queue. Build a new chronicle-closer Lambda (new app) that consumes the queue, generates in parallel: (1) a third-person, past-tense chronicle short-story summary capturing player/GM messages, locations, inventory deltas, and skill checks, and attaches it to the chronicle as a completed item; (2) location-level high-level events (1-2 sentences each, append-only, optionally guided by beats) attached to each location; (3) character impact summaries (<= 1 sentence, covering major gains/losses of abilities/items/powers/allies/enemies) attached to the character bio. Design DTOs/prompts for extensible summary types, persist results in the proper persistence layer, and update infra to provision the queue + Lambda. Ensure prompts live in the new app.

title: Implement LLM audit review workflow
description: Add the moderator/admin-only LLM Audit Review experience described in LLM_AUDIT_REVIEW.md, including queue browsing, review workspace, persistence tied to the existing LLM audit archive, and template proposal generation plus review UI. Wire into the player widget and surface as a dedicated page.

title: Harden JSON parsing retries in LLM client
description: langGraph LLM client occasionally logs `llm_json_parse_failed` because providers return fenced or double-encoded JSON strings. Implement coercion heuristics (strip code fences, unwrap quotes, double-parse strings) before failing and retry the llm-proxy request when parsing still fails.

title: Migrate intent DAG to dedicated classifiers and OpenAI responses
description: Implement the LangGraph upgrade documented in PLAYER_INTENT_TYPES.md: break intent intake into separate beat and skill detector nodes, refresh the prompt templates to match the DAG roles, route classifier nodes through gpt-5-nano with the llmResolver, migrate the llm-proxy to the OpenAI responses API with reasoning/text knobs, and update docs/changelog accordingly.

title: Chronicle wrap closure flow
description: Gm summary should return JSON with closure flag, closing chronicle server-side and blocking new turns in UI and API.

title: Fix llm proxy _zod undefined error
description: llm proxy requests crash with "Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '_zod')". Investigate the proxy service, identify where the request lifecycle references _zod on an undefined object, and restore functionality for all requests.

title: Fold API Gateway wiring into Lambda module
Implement moderator location maintenance workspace
description: Build the Location Maintenance feature described in LOCATION_MAINTENANCE_IMPL.md. Surface a moderator/admin-only workflow accessible from the player widget that loads the location graph through the existing location-api stack, provides list/tree/graph browsing of locations, and enables editing names, descriptions, tags, and relationships. Persist changes back through the hybrid location graph store without feature flags.

title: Implement chronicle beats
description: Add chronicle beat system: enable beats per chronicle (default true) with beat DTO (title, description, status), auto-create beat on first turn, allow GM to create/resolution nodes, persist in chronicle persistence, expose via DTO/API, render beats in client nav, ensure player intent references beats, add beat progress/resolution node.

title: Fix listChronicles/listCharacters integration error
description: AWS API Gateway reports "Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'method')" when invoking the /chronicle/listCharacters,listChronicles combined route. Investigate Lambda handler, ensure the route accepts expected payload, and restore functionality.
